title: Complete On-Hit Gangplank?
body:
Ok.
I know this probably sounds stupid but what if you could make GP's Q (Parrley), do like a gazzilion effects such as: AoE Damage, AoE Slow, more Magic Damage and more Physical Damage In a % form?
Well to do this you would build GP with these Items:{{item:3074}} {{item:3025}} {{item:3087}} {{item:3091}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3158}} 
It would also give him perfect stats such as: AD, LS, Armor, Mana, AS, MR, MS, CDR and more!
Wouldn't this be the most effective build, making GP an Auto - Attack based champion who also can deal damage from afar?
I think it would!
Please leave your thoughts below! :)
